body_html: @jimfleming have you gotten a shared library working? I tried @aliasaila's suggestion and also got seg fault when trying to run my program. When compiling with the cc_library option, I do get a .so file, but it is very small, and when compiling I have undefined references. So I know something isn't set up correctly. thanks
